constraints.name: range_bound
constraints.description: 每把自动伞的初始位置和长度必须在马路宽度范围内

constraints.name: movement_constraint
constraints.description: 每把自动伞只能在马路边界内往返移动，不能越过边界
constraints.formal: 0 <= x + v * t < W 且 0 <= x + v * t + l < W 对于所有 0 <= t <= T

constraints.name: coverage_constraint
constraints.description: 计算从开始下雨到 T 秒钟后，未被自动伞覆盖的区域的降雨体积
constraints.formal: V * (W * T - 被伞覆盖的面积)
